articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to February 11 Plant of Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to February 11 Plant of Ryongsong Machine Complex
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the February 11 Plant of the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 He looked round the newly remodeled room dedicated to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He said that the history of the development of the plant represents the history of the guidance given by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He underscored the need for the plant to start full-scale serial production of modern machines as early as possible by waging a dynamic drive for bringing their performance to the world's level and thus glorify the leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He looked round various places of the plant including the processing and assembling shops to learn in detail about the production.
					
					 It is something to be proud of that the plant has updated all production processes including boring and milling machines, turning lathes and vertical heat treatment oven by widely applying advanced technology, thereby raising the performance of the existing equipment and their production efficiency and precision rate of machine parts processing, he noted.
					
					 The plant is a model to be followed by the whole country in updating aging equipment and making an effective use of them, he said, calling upon other units to earnestly learn from its experience. 
					
					 Noting that the plant has made a lot of achievements in the drive to contrive and manufacture latest machines, he repeatedly expressed satisfaction, saying: New type modern machines produced by the plant look very nice. This alone proves that the machine-building industry of the country has made a great leap forward in recent years.
					
					 Different sectors are now requiring more modern machines, he said, instructing the plant to meticulously organize the production to unfailingly carry out its national economic plan and, at the same time, work hard to perfectly conclude the work for developing new products at the earliest possible date.
					
					 He enjoyed an art performance given by the itinerant art squad of the plant.
					
					 Its performance represents a dynamic political work, he said, adding that every number of its repertoire correctly reflected the party's policies and it was pervaded with the love for the plant and truthfully depicted the revolutionary and militant character of its workers.
					
					 He said that while going round the plant, he could learn well about the loyalty of its workers who trusted and followed the party and the leaders only in good or bad days. He expressed conviction that the party would as always remain strong and emerge victorious thanks to such workers as those of the plant.
					
					 He had a photo session with the labor innovators, expressing belief that the workers of the plant would make a positive contribution to developing the nation's machine-building industry.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party.
					 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by head of the delegation Z. Batbayar, secretary in charge of external relations of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, on Thursday.

articles.title: Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Delegation of Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Delegation of Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), met and had a talk with the delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party headed by Z. Batbayar, secretary in charge of external relations, which paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials visited the International Friendship Exhibition House on Thursday on the occasion of the DPRK-Iran friendship week.
					 They paid tribute to the wax replicas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits for the development of friendly relations among countries and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 They looked round the gifts presented to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by party, state and government leaders and prominent figures of many countries. 
					
					 The ambassador made an entry in a visitor's book.

articles.title: Anniversary of Russia's Victory in Great Patriotic War Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Russia's Victory in Great Patriotic War Marked
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a film show here on Thursday to mark the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War. 
					 Present there were Kim Jin Bom, chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association and vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora and staff members of his embassy and other Russian guests staying in the DPRK. 
					
					 The participants watched a Soviet feature film.

articles.title: World Day of Red Cross and Red Crescent Marked
articles.content:
World Day of Red Cross and Red Crescent Marked
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday on the occasion of the World Day of Red Cross and Red Crescent under the co-sponsorship of the DPRK Red Cross Society and the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kang Su Rin, chairman of the C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society, and its officials, officials concerned, members of the delegations.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 The participants heard the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in developing the society and its history, and activities of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by schoolchildren and talked with each other to conduct brisk Red Cross activities.
					
					 Meanwhile, colorful events took place in branches of the society on the same day.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A stamp was issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to commemorate the 2015 Milano World Expo.
					 Seen in the stamp is Kaesong Koryo insam, an indigenous product of Korea.
					
					 Kaesong Koryo insam contains insam saponin, sugars, essential oil, amino acid, peptide, organic acid, minerals, microelements and vitamins. Insam is specially efficacious for the promotion of health and longevity. 
					
					 It is widely used in making cosmetics for the prevention of skin aging and all kinds of skin diseases and loss of hair.

articles.title: Economic Progress in DPRK
articles.content:
Economic Progress in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Economic plans for April were overfulfilled at heavy industrial establishments in the DPRK.
					 Factories and enterprises under the Ministry of Machine-building Industry carried out their plans at 140.5 percent.
					
					 In particular, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex fulfilled its monthly plan twice.
					
					 The electrical machinery and rolling stock industrial sections carried out their assignments at 113 percent and 153.5 percent respectively.
					
					 The April production plan was successfully carried out in construction and building-materials industrial and forestry sections, too.

articles.title: Badminton Contest of Officials Held
articles.content:
Badminton Contest of Officials Held
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A badminton contest of officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions took place at the Badminton Gymnasium in Chongchun Street from May 4 to 7.
					 It brought together over 400 men and women players of more than 90 units.
					
					 The players displayed good technique in the events.
					
					 The Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, the Ministry of Food Procurement and Administration, the Unha Guidance Bureau and the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea won the contest in groups.

articles.title: Software for Weightlifting Training Developed
articles.content:
Software for Weightlifting Training Developed
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A software for weightlifting training was developed by Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK.
					 The software indicates not only targets to be achieved in training but also shortcomings of weightlifters.
					
					 It helps put planning of training and its performance on a scientific basis.

articles.title: Leucobin Tablet Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Leucobin Tablet Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Korea Sambok Trading Corporation in the DPRK has developed leucobin tablet.
					 This tablet is considered to be effective for incurable blood disorder and dyshematopoiesis.
					
					 According to the clinical study, it is very efficacious for chronic myeloid leukemia in particular.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Deals with Ever-widening Gap between Poor and Rich
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Deals with Ever-widening Gap between Poor and Rich
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The ever-widening gap between the rich and the poor in the present world is ascribable to "globalization" and the old international economic order, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 "Globalization" rooted in Western-style "liberal democracy" is, in essence, to capitalize the world, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 To this end, the reactionaries of history forced all countries in the world to introduce capitalistic "multi-party system" and "democracy" into their politics.
					
					 Political chaos and socio-economic catastrophe have been fomented in the countries which introduced "globalization" and their peoples have groaned with misfortune and pain.
					
					 The present international economic order established by the imperialists is the unfair economic relations in which such jungle law as inequality among countries, encroachment upon sovereignty of other countries and unilateral interests-seeking prevails.
					
					 By taking advantage of various levers of the present old and unfair international economic system, the imperialists have enforced predatory policies to seek their own interests only by sacrificing the ones of developing countries.
					
					 The reality proves that the tragedy that the rich get ever richer and the poor get ever poorer can neither be terminated nor can an independent and prosperous world be built unless the old and unfair international economic order is shattered.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S.-led Human Rights Campaign against DPRK Counterproductive
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S.-led Human Rights Campaign against DPRK Counterproductive
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S., Japan and the south Korean puppet regime are going busy sponsoring anti-DPRK "human rights" farces such as the "week of freedom in north Korea", hearing and seminar in the U.S.
					 There, the "special envoy for human rights issue in north Korea" of the U.S. Department of State cried out for ratcheting up pressure upon the DPRK over its "human rights issue" and leading the thinking of its citizens to a change through "Free North Korea Radio" and information media.
					
					 The Japan minister in charge of the "abduction issue", supporting the establishment of a UN "office for human rights in the north", talked rubbish that it is necessary for the UNSC to "continue discussing the human rights issue in north Korea."
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime has also gone reckless, taking advantage of the U.S.-led human rights racket against the DPRK.
					
					 This campaign should never be overlooked as it is part of the hostile forces' reckless moves to intensify the attack against the DPRK over its non-existent human rights issue.
					
					 This campaign is the most vivid manifestation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK as it is aimed at bringing down its socialist system centered on the popular masses. The socialist system was chosen by themselves and they deem it dearer than their lives.
					
					 The U.S. scenario was clearly evidenced by the fact that the secretary general of the "Commission for Human Rights in North Korea" underlined the need for the U.S. government to let the UN and governments of various countries join in dealing with the "human rights issue in north Korea."
					
					 To seek the total collapse of the socialist system in the DPRK through an "all-out offensive" is the pivot of Washington's hostile policy towards the former.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to internationalize the human rights campaign against the DPRK is, in essence, a hideous fascist dictatorial one not to recognize its political mode and social system but to transform them as required by the former only. In the final analysis, it is an act of destroying the foundation of the mechanism for guaranteeing human rights established by the international community. 
					
					 All the charades recently staged in the U.S., the worst human rights abuser, are no more than political cartoons designed to falsify truth and pull the wool over the eyes of the world people with lies and fabrications.
					
					 Tragedy is that the U.S. and its allies are recklessly behaving, utterly unaware of the consequences to be entailed by the above-said racket.
					
					 They had better face up to the stark reality that the escalating racket against the DPRK would only harden the Korean people's faith in socialism and their will to firmly defend it.
					
					 Their escalating pressure upon the DPRK would only compel it to take tougher counteraction to foil it.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Can Never Evade Responsibility for Deteriorating Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Can Never Evade Responsibility for Deteriorating Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The present abysmal relations between the north and the south are the inevitable consequences of the reckless treachery of the south Korean puppet authorities keen on the confrontation moves against the DPRK in league with outside forces standing against its efforts to improve the relations. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' talk about "dialogue" is a plot to evade the responsibility for deteriorating the north-south relations and justify their confrontation policy.
					
					 They remain unchanged in their sinister plot to hurt the DPRK while abusing the north-south dialogue for confrontation with the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that they staged such provocative farce as the "week for freedom in the north" while vociferating about "preparations for dialogue", and kicked off anti-DPRK "human rights" racket again, crying out for passing the "bill on human rights in the north" through the "National Assembly." 
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean chief executive who is taking the lead in the confrontation racket against the north. 
					
					 She is persisting in confrontation with the north, not giving up her extreme hostility toward the fellow countrymen in the north and wild ambition for "unification of social systems." 
					
					 Nothing can be settled though the DPRK sits at negotiating table with those who are desperately working to hurt it, obsessed with confrontation with the fellow countrymen. Therefore, it is very self-evident that it is impossible to mend the north-south relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Fascist Suppression of People Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Fascist Suppression of People Blasted
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea in a statement on May 7 condemned the south Korean puppet regime for resorting to brutal suppression of the demonstrators demanding the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and the right to existence.
					 The fierce, anti-"government" actions now under way in various parts of south Korea are an eruption of the pent-up grudge and resentment of the people at the regime which put the people's living into destitution  through unpopular rule and the revival of "yusin" dictatorship, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the world community, including the UN human rights organization, is expressing deep concern over the regime's brutal suppression of protestors, the poor human rights situation and the fascist "Security Law."
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet forces are taking human scum to foreign countries to stage such charades as "symposium on human rights in the north" and are going reckless in their moves to let the UN "mission on human rights in the north" appear in Seoul . 
					
					 The south Korean people are extremely angered by the regime.
					
					 If the puppet forces persist in such brutal crackdown on the just actions of the people, they will not escape their final doom.

articles.title: Corruption and Irregularities Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Corruption and Irregularities Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Puppet Air Force Chief of Staff Choe Cha Gyu was recently disclosed to have been engrossed in irregularities and corruption, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 He spent hundreds of millions of won for furnishing his office and embezzled tens of millions of won for purchasing beds, etc. in pursuance of his luxury and glory.
					
					 Much upset by mounting public criticism and its arrow getting directed toward it, the puppet military began hypocritical inspection of him.
					
					 All facts prove the inspection is aimed to cover up the past crimes and ward off mounting social criticism.

articles.title: Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Is Historical Fact: Former Japanese Journalist
articles.content:
Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Is Historical Fact: Former Japanese Journalist
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Takashi Uemura, former Asahi Shimbun journalist, gave a lecture at a university in New York on May 4 at which he denounced the Japanese government for denying the coercion involved in the sexual slavery, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is a historical fact and the Japanese government should make an apology for it without fail, he said.
					
					 He stressed once again that story which appeared on Asahi Shimbun in the past about the testimony made by a victim of the sexual slavery was true.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Russian Papers
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Russian papers dedicated articles to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President and his photos and ones documenting revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The April issue of Narodnui Awangard, the April 16 issue of Selskaya Zhizn and the April 9-15 issue of Argumenti Nejelli said that the President, waging the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle, positively aided the Chinese revolution and defended the Soviet Union with arms.
					
					 They also said that the President rendered material and moral support to the countries and peoples in their efforts for independence against imperialism even in the post-war difficult days.
					
					 Veteran No. 15 praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for fully demonstrating his pluck and grit as the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Moskovskii Komsomolets on April 15 lauded him for wisely leading the Korean people with his resolute determination, transparent faith and unpredictably mysterious politics, based on the philosophical thinking.

articles.title: Korean Socialism Praised by Russian Figure
articles.content:
Korean Socialism Praised by Russian Figure
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place at National University of Humanities in Far East, Russia on April 29. It was given by Valery Timoshenko, chairman of the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK, who visited the DPRK as head of a delegation of the society on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants watched a video introducing the delegation's visit to Pyongyang and the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Valery Timoshenko said that the DPRK is peculiar socialism in which all the people are invariably advancing along the road chosen by themselves, rallied close around their leader.
					
					 The DPRK is a very stable and peaceful country, not an unstable country touted by the U.S. and other Western countries, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The Korean people are taking a full rest and spending joyful times at the amusement parks and parks and knowing no words suppression, violence and arbitrary practices by the army or police.
					
					 I realized the mind of the Korean people to value and defend the national identity, seeing them wearing splendid and beautiful national dresses.
					
					 We should have a correct understanding of the friendly and fraternal DPRK developing day by day under the wise guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica 11 de Febrero del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica 11 de Febrero del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica 11 de Febrero del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					El estuvo primero en la recien remodelada sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Dijo que la historia de desarrollo de la fabrica es precisamente la trayectoria de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Instruyo que la fabrica ha de glorificar las hazanas de direccion de los grandes lideres al entrar cuanto antes en la plena produccion serial mediante una intensa lucha por elevar al nivel mundial las especificaciones de modernos productos mecanicos.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos de la fabrica inclusive los talleres de procesamiento y montaje, averiguo en detalles el estado de produccion.
					
					Al introducir activamente las tecnologias avanzadas, la fabrica modernizo generalmente sus procesos productivos, inclusive taladradora, fresadora, torno vertical y horno vertical de tratamiento termico y asi mejoro la capacidad y productividad de los equipos existentes y la precision de procesamiento de los articulos, apunto.
					
					La Fabrica 11 de Febrero es el modelo de todo el pais en modernizar los equipos viejos y utilizarlos con eficiencia, dijo y continuo que otras unidades deben aprender mucho las experiencias de ella.
					
					Esta fabrica logro muchos exitos en los trabajos para inventar y producir las maquinas sofisticadas, remarco.
					
					Volvio a ponerse satisfecho diciendo que lucen elegantes las modernas maquinas nuevamente fabricadas y ellas hacen conocer que la industria de maquinaria de nuestro pais ha dado un gran salto en los ultimos anos.
					
					Actualmente, varios sectores demandan muchas maquinas modernas, senalo y ordeno a la fabrica que cumpliera sin falta el plan de economia nacional al organizar minuciosamente la produccion y trabajara intensamente para concluir perfectamente en breve tiempo el desarrollo de nuevos productos.
					
					A continuacion, Kim Jong Un presencio la funcion del grupo de agitacion artistica movil de la fabrica.
					
					Senalo que la funcion es una labor politica vivida y todas sus piezas reflejan correctamente las politicas del Partido demostrando el gran afecto a la fabrica y el caracter revolucionario y combativo de los obreros.
					
					Esta visita me hizo conocer bien la noble fidelidad de la clase obrera de la fabrica que vino confiando y apoyando unicamente al Partido y al Lider en las buenas y en las malas, destaco y agrego que contando con tales obreros, nuestro Partido sera siempre firme y victorioso como antes.
					
					Expresando la esperanza de que los obreros de la fabrica contribuiran mucho al desarrollo de la industria de maquinaria del pais, se fotografio con los innovadores laborales.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de delegacion del PPRM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de delegacion del PPRM
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dedicara la delegacion del Partido Popular Revolucionario de Mongolia, de visita en Corea.
					Z, Batbayar, secretario encargado de relaciones exteriores de esa organizacion, lo traslado el dia 7 a Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Encuentro de cine dedicado a 70o aniversario de victoria en gran guerra patria de Rusia
articles.content:
Encuentro de cine dedicado a 70o aniversario de victoria en gran guerra patria de Rusia
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la proyeccion filmica dedicada al 70o aniversario de la victoria de la gran guerra patria de Rusia.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Jin Bom, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia y vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, los funcionarios interesados y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Tambien participaron el embajador Matsegora y otros miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea y los huespedes rusos quienes permanecen en Corea.
					
					Los participantes vieron una pelicula de ficcion de la URSS.

articles.title: Efectuados actos por Dia Mundial de Cruz Roja y Medialuna Roja
articles.content:
Efectuados actos por Dia Mundial de Cruz Roja y Medialuna Roja
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang el encuentro de amistad por el Dia Mundial de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, coauspiciado por la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las delegaciones de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja que trabajan en Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de la ACR inclusive el presidente del CC de esta organizacion, Kang Su Rin, los otros interesados, los miembros de las delegaciones mencionadas y fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion fueron explicadas las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la ACR y presentados el historial de la misma entidad, los trabajos de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja.
					
					Los participantes presenciaron una funcion artistica de los ninos escolares y conversaron sobre el tema de dinamizar las actividades de Cruz Roja.
					
					Por otra parte, con motivo de la misma efemeride, tuvieron lugar variados actos en las sucursales de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja.

articles.title: Pastilla de Leucobin desarrollada en RPDC
articles.content:
Pastilla de Leucobin desarrollada en RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Compania Comercial Sambok de Corea desarrollo la pastilla de Leucobin.
					Esta medicina es evaluada por los especialistas como la mejor en el tratamiento de las enfermedades de sangre dificiles de curar y la disfuncion de hematopoyesis.
					
					Segun resultado clinico, es efectiva en el tratamiento de la leucemia de medulisis cronica.

articles.title: ACNC comenta farsa de DDHH anti-RPDC en EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta farsa de DDHH anti-RPDC en EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos, Japon y el Sur de Corea se entregaron en el territorio norteamericano a las farsas de "derechos humanos" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea incluyendo la "semana de libertad del Norte de Corea", la audiencia y el seminario.
					En las ocasiones el "enviado especial de DDHH del Norte de Corea" del Departamento de Estado norteamericano solto la necesidad de intensificar la presion internacional contra la RPDC y "cambiar" la conciencia de los habitantes norcoreanos a traves de la "Radio del Norte Libre" y otros  medios de prensa acusandola de "problema de DDHH" .
					
					La ministra japonesa encargada del "problema de secuestro" apoyo el establecimiento de la "oficina de DDHH del Norte de Corea" de la ONU, diciendo que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU tiene la "necesidad de discutir el problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea".
					
					Tambien, los titeres surcoreanos se sumaron a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					No podemos menos de estar con brazos cruzados ante las maniobras imprudentes de los enemigos por atacarnos so pretexto de los "DDHH".
					
					Las maniobras intrigantes de "DDHH" presididas por EE.UU. encaminadas a derrocar el regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares optado y apreciado mas que su vida por el pueblo coreano, son la maxima expresion de las maquinaciones  hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. enfoco su politica anti-RPDC al "cambio cualitativo" de nuestro regimen, o sea al derrumbe del sistema socialista.
					
					Lo comprueba que el secretario general del "Comite de Derechos Humanos del Norte de Corea" de EE.UU. dijo que el gobierno estadounidense debe hacer que participen la ONU y gobiernos de cada pais en la solucion del "problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea".
					
					Derrumbar totalmente nuestro regimen socialista presionandola con la "ofensiva de todos los lados", esto es el pilar principal de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					La internacionalizacion de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. deviene, en su esencia, la atroz maniobra dictatorial fascista para reformarla solo segun la demanda y el deseo del imperio sin reconocer el modo politico y el regimen social establecidos en ella.
					
					Igualmente es el acto que destruye la base del sistema de aseguramiento de DDHH establecido en la sociedad internacional.
					
					La campana intrigante de toda indole librada en el territorio norteamericano, origen del complot de DDHH, es la descarada farsa politica encaminada a encubrir la verdad con la falsedad y enganar a todo el mundo con la conspiracion y la falsificacion.
					
					La tragedia reside en que EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites actuan sin tener el juicio elemental sobre las consecuencias  que emanen de sus farsas de "DDHH" contra la RPDC.
					
					Es decir, ellos dan espaldas a la realidad evidente, en que cuanto mas eleven el grado de las maniobras intrigantes de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles, tanto mas se tornan cada dia mas fuertes la conviccion y la voluntad del pueblo coreano en el socialismo, razon por la cual se hace anicos el complot de "DDHH".
					
					Tales maniobras centuplican la vehemente indignacion del pueblo coreano.
					
					Cuanto mas ellos inculquen el ambiente de presion anti-RPDC, tanto mas se intensificara nuestra voluntad de enfrentamiento intransigente.
